definition[0]: bad economic conditions in which people do not have much money to spend
example[0]: a time of great austerity after the war
example[1]: the austerities of post-communist Eastern Europe
definition[1]: when a government has a deliberate policy of trying to reduce the amount of money it spends
example[2]: IMF-backed austerity measures  (=reductions in government spending)
example[5]: her childhood memories of war-time austerity
